entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
